ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The highest degree of severity.: A microscopic finding indicating the presence of a cellular infiltrate or isolated cells that have features suspicious for malignancy.: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.: The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.: Having been established or verified.: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.
The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
